external_games.name: Idle Champions - Icewind Dale Artemis Skin & Feat Pack

name: Idle Champions: Icewind Dale Artemis Skin & Feat Pack
summary: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Artemis (if you don't already own them) Icewind Dale Artemis Skin An Epic Feat for Artemis 7 Gold Artemis Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts
